title: High ping/packet loss?
body:
I've been getting some packet loss in the past couple of weeks and it's really annoying, especially when I'm trying to play ranked. It doesn't happen all the time--however, it's happened a lot more recently than it has since the server move.

Another thing I've noticed is that I have incredibly high ping when you consider how far I am from the servers. I live in Chicago and I get 15-17 ping on average, yet I've come across people who live farther away (Champaign, Indiana, Michigan, Wisconsin, etc.) and they get lower ping (constant 10 or 11 ping), which doesn't make sense since the servers are supposed to be in Chicago.

My ISP is Comcast in case anybody is wondering.

replies.body: If the packet loss has been random then there could be a local issue causing the delays.  I'd consider an ISP issue but it doesn't sound like your ping is consistently high.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, making sure to go over each instruction to help rule out possibilities.  Let me know if it helps!
